          <title>
            <string language="en">Stretching a spring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausdehnen einer Feder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étirage d'un ressort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esticando uma mola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Allungamento della molla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέντωμα ενός ελατηρίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estirar un resorte</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure shows how a spring is deformed elastically by suspending a load on one end of the spring.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">deformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elastic deformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">load</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stretching a spring</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie eine Feder elastisch 
verformt wird, indem man eine Eingabe an einem Ende des Frühlinges 
verschiebt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette figure montre comment un ressort est 
déformé élastique en suspendant un chargement sur une extrémité 
du ressort.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta figura mostra como uma mola é deformada 
elàstica suspendendo uma carga em uma extremidade da mola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa figura mostra come una molla è deformata 
elastico sospendendo un carico su un'estremità della molla.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο αριθμός επιδεικνύει πώς ένα ελατήριο 
παραμορφώνεται ελαστικά με την αναστολή ενός φορτίου σε ένα 
τέλος του ελατηρίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta figura muestra cómo un resorte es deformido
elástico suspendiendo una carga en un extremo del resorte.</string>
          </description>
